name: Sync Translations
description: Ensure all translation files (en/ru/uz) are synchronized
prompt:
Synchronize translation files across all languages:

1. Run `make check tr` to identify inconsistencies
2. For each missing or inconsistent translation:
   - Add/update in en.toml (English)
   - Add/update in ru.toml (Russian)
   - Add/update in uz.toml (Uzbek)
3. Ensure proper key naming (avoid TOML reserved words)
4. Follow enum pattern: `Module.Enums.EnumType.VALUE`
5. Run `make check tr` again to verify

Report what was synchronized and any remaining issues.
